item.title: Magic short special (P.I)
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:4, topic:444991”][quote author=ravekitty link=topic=547670.msg4015594#msg4015594 date=1339602756]

We’re not a spoon feeding community!

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Off topic: IF you are still bored.
I’ve noticed you telling alot of people to use for methods.
You could create a tutorial on how and when to use for methods? c;
[/quote]

Not much to explain with those, lol. I wouldn’t consider it a tutorial for the tut section anyways.[/quote]
Private message me so i don’t spam dis thread. o_O

Read full topic
